ygData.subject: Re: RE: Another Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually banish only des 565 or so when you first get it at level 44. ... until ... I can
ygData.messageBody:
Actually banish only des 565 or so when you first get it at level 44.


At 10:40 AM 12/21/99 -0600, you wrote:
>From: srutkowski@...
>
>
>
>Drizben hit it right on the head, even if he is a dark elf :)
>
>Most of our HP/AC buffs and DD spells go do up a couple points each level
until
>a certain level, after which they remain at the same point level. Words of
>Force (220 dam) and Banish Undead (585 dam) being the only two spells that
I can
>think of that remain the same once you get them, level 49 and level 44
>respectively (possible Shield of Words- 31 AC, level 49).
>
>Of course, all spells eventually stop increasing at level 50.........
>
><grin>
>
>Ailamil Faithbringer
>Tunare's not-so-humble Servant
>
>
>Drizben wrote:
>
>Example: Wrath does 198 points at 29th, 200 at 30, 202 at 31 and 204 at 32.
>I just made 33 last night and haven't cast it yet so I am assuming it will
>either go to 206 or stay at 204.
>
>Also, it's not only our DD spells, if you check your buffs they go up by a
>point or 2 per level as well. Bravery gave me 122hp last level, now it gives
>123.
>
>>
